job_description: Growth Marketing Software Engineer Data Science is all about breaking new ground to enable businesses to answer their most urgent questions. Pioneering massively parallel data-intensive analytic processing, our mission is to develop a whole new approach to generating meaning and value from petabyte-scale data sets and shape brand new methodologies, tools, statistical methods and models. What’s more, we are in collaboration with leading academics, industry experts and highly skilled engineers to equip our customers to generate sophisticated new insights from the biggest of big data. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Growth Marketing Software Engineer on our Data Engineering Team in Bratislava, Slovakia What you’ll achieve As a Growth Marketing Software Engineer, you’ll be responsible for interaction with business leaders and internal customers to create and establish design standards and assurance processes for software, systems and applications development to ensure compatibility and operability. You’ll also analyze business goals, defines project scope and identifies functional and technical requirements to produce accurate business insights. You will: Participate in communication with end users and business teams to define software/data requirements and specifications and identify user issues. Partner with both internal & external sources to design, build and oversee the deployment and operation of technology architecture, solutions, and software. Work in collaboration with data engineers, data scientists, architects and business teams to design strategic projects and break complex problems into actionable tasks. Develop software to transform and use data, automate processes, provide user interfaces for end users, improve the efficiency of our codebase, and maintain and debug infrastructure systems. Review and implement test strategies for software products. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements : Proven experience with the following frontend and backend technologies: JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Nodejs, Express.js, RESTful APIs. Proven experience working with Python in the context of Automation, Web Scraping, Data Analysis, Data Exploration and/or Machine Learning. Good practical knowledge of Relational databases (any of the following: PostgreSQL, Greenplum, Redshift, RDS, Oracle, MySQL). Knowledge of NoSQL databases is a plus. Good knowledge of Git or other version control systems. 2-5 years of related experience and education (Bachelor’s degree or higher) in Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience Desirable Requirements : Experience working both independently and in a collaborative, cross-functional team environment within an Agile framework. Experience using Docker and Kubernetes to containerize and orchestrate applications. Salary starting from: 1 880 Euro/gross monthly Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. Application closing date: 3rd November 2023 Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. Read the full Equal Employment Opportunity Policy here . #profesia Job ID: R227445 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our locations page.
